external_games.name: Doubutsujima no Chubi Gurumi 2: Tama-chan Monogatari

name: Doubutsujima no Chubi Gurumi 2: Tama-chan Monogatari
summary: Doubutsujima no Chubi Gurumi 2: Tama-chan Monogatari is an Action game, developed by AI and published by Rocket Company, which was released in Japan in 2004.
